content: make your first garment and layer it over all your favorite tops stitched in caron simply soft this mesh vest is a breezy garment that can be worn all year long the instructions are accompanied by step-by-step photos to guide you making it even easier to express yourself through your fashion learn double_crochet chain seaming double_crochet 2 together and more it s a versatile addition to any closet materials caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 g 315 yds/288 m xs/s/m l/xl 2/3xl 4/5xl persimmon 39754 4 4 5 6 balls
